title: Detroit's Fiscal Future Rests With A Federal Judge
teaser: Detroit's future comes down to this: a federal trial over the city's plan to emerge from largest municipal bankruptcy ever in the U.S. As Detroit Public Radio's Quinn Klinefelter reports, city officials argue the plan is the best way to propel Detroit into prosperity â€” but some major creditors aren't pleased with it.
